name: Lost AI
description:
Humans and aliens have agreed to work together on a big project to help strengthen their relationship.

The facility that they worked in has been silent for a long time though and you are sent to investigate it.

Controls:

  • WASD to move around
  • Shift to sprint
  • Mouse to look around
  • Left click to shoot
  • F to interact
  • C to use medkits

This game was made for Godot WIld Jam  #35

Have fun :)
